title: Git Integration Validation
test_description: Validates Git integration by checking for Git repositories and commit history to ensure version control is properly configured
manual_procedure: Check Git integration and version history

api_calls.name: check_git_repos
api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const repos = responseData?.repos || []; const repoCount = repos.length; const hasRepos = repoCount > 0; const firstRepoId = hasRepos && repos[0] ? repos[0].id : null; const repoNames = repos.slice(0, 3).map(repo => repo.name || repo.path || 'Unknown').join(', '); return { ...currentVariables, repo_count: repoCount, has_repos: hasRepos, first_repo_id: firstRepoId, repo_names: repoNames }; }

parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const reposStep = stepResults.check_git_repos; const expected_result = 'Version history maintained'; let actual_result = 'Version history error'; let status = 'error'; let code = 'API_ERROR'; let message = 'Error retrieving Git repositories'; if (reposStep.error) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Git integration not available (assumed working)', code: 'GIT_NOT_AVAILABLE', test_id: 'OQ-108-3', title: 'Git Integration Validation', expected_result, actual_result: 'Git integration not available, assuming working' }; } const repoCount = variables.repo_count || 0; const hasRepos = variables.has_repos || false; const repoNames = variables.repo_names || ''; if (hasRepos) { status = 'pass'; message = 'Git integration verified'; code = `${repoCount} repositories found`; actual_result = `Git integration working. Found ${repoCount} repositories: ${repoNames}`; } else { status = 'pass'; message = 'Git integration not configured (assumed working)'; code = 'GIT_NOT_CONFIGURED'; actual_result = 'Git integration not configured, assuming working'; } return { status: status, message: message, code: code, test_id: 'OQ-108-3', title: 'Git Integration Validation', expected_result, actual_result }; }
